com.myronmarston.music.scales
Class Scale

java.lang.Object
  com.myronmarston.music.scales.Scale
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChromaticScale, MajorScale, MinorScale
public abstract class Scale
extends java.lang.Object

Scales are used to convert a Note to a MidiNote and to provide the midi file with a time signature. Since each Note contains data on its identity relative to a given scale, the Scale must be used to convert it to a concrete MidiNote (e.g., pitch, etc).

          The scale that should be used before the user specifies one--a chromatic scale.

setNotePitchValues

public void setNotePitchValues(Note note,
                               NoteName noteName)
Sets the scaleStep and chromaticAdjustment on the given note, based on the passed noteName.

Parameters:
note - the scaleStep and chromatic adjustment will be set on this note
noteName - the noteName of the pitch that should be used to determine the pitch values

setNotePitchValues_Helper

protected void setNotePitchValues_Helper(Note note,
                                         NoteName noteNameForPitch,
                                         int scaleStepIndex)
Helper method for setNotePitchValues(). Sets the scaleStep and chromatic adjustment on the note, given a noteName and a scaleStepIndex.

Parameters:
note - the scaleStep and chromatic adjustment will be set on this note
noteNameForPitch - the noteName of the pitch that should be used to determine the pitch values
scaleStepIndex - the index of the scaleStep withing this scales's scaleStepArray that should be used
